entity.name: Edge_based_wireframe_shape_representation
entity.description: An edge_based_wireframe_shape_representation is a three dimensional shape_representation that represents the shape, or a portion of the shape, of a product by wireframes that are trimmed by edge topology. This includes all three-dimensional curves and topological entities that define a graph of vertices and edges.

where.label: IP1
where.description: The items in an edge_based_wireframe_shape_representation shall be an edge_based_wireframe_model, mapped_item, or axis2_placement_3d.

where.label: IP2
where.description: At least one of the items in an edge_based_wireframe_shape_representation shall be either an edge_based_wireframe_model or a mapped_item.

where.label: IP3
where.description: Every edge in an edge_based_wireframe_model shall be an edge_curve.

where.label: IP4
where.description: Every polyline that underlies an edge of an edge_based_wireframe_model shall be defined by more than two distinct points.

where.label: IP5
where.description: Every vertex defined for an edge_based_wireframe_model shall be a vertex_point.

where.label: IP6
where.description: The edge_geometry that underlies an edge for an edge_based_wireframe_model shall be a line, conic, b_spline_curve, offset_curve_3d, polyline, or curve_replica and the curves that have a basis defined by other curves are done so consistently. In the case of an offset_curve_3d or curve_replica the curve referenced as basis_curve shall be one of the above types.

where.label: IP7
where.description: The vertex_geometry that underlies the edges for an edge_based_wireframe_model shall be a cartesian_point or point_replica and the point_replica shall replicate either another point_replica or a cartesian_point.

where.label: IP8
where.description: If there is a mapped_item in an edge_based_wireframe_shape_representation, the source of the mapped_item shall be an edge_based_wireframe_shape_representation.

where.label: IP9
where.description: The edge_based_wireframe_shape_representation shall have a coordinate_space_dimension equal to three.
